comments: Great teacher if you just put in a little effort he will give u the A. He lets you use your computer on tests and quizzes.

He is a really good teacher for itn 100. Gives a lot of time to turn in the homework even accepts it by email. All the exams are open book/computer .If you do well on the exams, he will not give you the final exam.

Great teacher and definitely knows his stuff! I came into the class not knowing that much and left with a much better understanding of IT networking. Exams are openbook but you should still study a bit.
Great Professor, cares about students. Highly recommend. Teaches everything in understandable way.

Very good at keeping the classes attention through a subject that even he says is out-dated. He stated at the beginning of the course that the class woudl be simple and that all you need to do is pay attention. We had 3 open book, open note, open laptop quizzes and 3 homework assignments I highly reccomend him for anyone that needs the credit

One of the nicest Professors you can meet. Very helpful through out the course. Does give open notes tests but if you pay attention he will cover all the important aspects of the class, clearly. He incorporates a lot of real world relevance to the subject. highly recommend
Very chill guy. Very knowledgeable. Always lets class out an hour early.
Very easy class. He gives you all the power point presentations, which come directly from the book. Quizzes are take home and open book/notes. Very flexible and has a lot of knowledge on the subject.

If you have ANY familiarity with computers, you\'ll find this to be a pretty easy/boring class. Good: Take home tests/quizzes and minimal homework. Bad: Never sticks to syllabus, so you really need to be there every week. Plus... he rambles. A lot. It makes for a very frustrating classroom experience.

Breath of fresh air! Very knowledgable who loves to teach and it shows. Very kind man who cares about what you learn & relevancy to your life. Patient & gives you multiple chances to understand how computers work.

Awesome professor! Really easy, explains everything you need to know clearly. His tests are open note and take home. A great professor take his course! Very light homework if you don\'t finish it in class.

He is not too hard. He explains everything really clearly and is always around if you have questions. He\'s really nice and he\'s lenient about attendance and late assignments; as long as you turn them all in before the end you\'re good. Tests are take home. He cares more about you learning WELL then putting in hours of work for just a grade.
